name: Factory 17
description:
Today is a special day. It looks ordinary, but it's far from it. Your hero is an simple worker, but he is destined for an unusual and unique fate. Today he supposed to become a non ordinary for others whatever he wants it or not.

Please set 1920x1080 at the monitor settings at your windows before the playing. Other resolutions have ui problems (disappearing text). Get all the endings to get the full plot details.
